entry.title: $2500 // No Fee 1 Bed with Private Deck in Bushwick!
entry.content:
Beautiful, renovated 1 bed/1 bath in Bushwick with private terrace!

Off the JM at Myrtle-Broadway - quick 20 minutes to Manhattan (even faster when the J runs express!)

Completely modern one bedroom with marble tile flooring, designer kitchen with island, large bedroom with organizational closet, gorgeous bathroom with deep soak tub, great light, huge private terrace and Bluetooth speaker system! Central AC, dishwasher, and laundry in building!

Steps to everything you could possibly need. Amazing cafe Leaf Eatery is downstairs, and short walk to Mr. Kiwi, Little Skips, Happyfun Hideaway, Birdie's, Food Bazzarr, and a plethora of great nightlife and convenience.

First + Last + Security/ No Fee
Pets upon approval
18 month lease

Contact Tia at show contact info to schedule a showing today!
